name: Sopan Technologies
tagline: We turn brilliant ideas into awesome web apps.
description:
Sopan Technologies is an IT consultancy & services firm based in India. We are primarily involved in software application development across various domains including Healthcare, Education and web applications.
We have extensive experience in large scale survey research and database management. Our strengths lies in devising survey tools, setting up data management systems, data analysis (qualitative and quantitative, both) and reporting. Sopan Technologies has worked on several prestigious international projects, including those with Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, Baltimore, MD, USA and South Carolina University, USA.
At Sopan Technologies, we create solutions that work. We are committed towards 100% customer satisfaction through the quality of work we deliver.
